name: 6 Days 6 Demons (unfinished)
description:
There's a blizzard, the power is out, and you're all alone.

Or are you? 

A mistake you made bites you back as the 6 demons and their leader Pride are after you(?) Can you escape?

...unfortunately, the game is probably never going to be finished! Was made in 2017.  Sowwy.

Windows only, but here's a thread on how to play on Mac computers.

Use the ESC or x key to access the menu, and arrow keys to move, and z or enter to interact with NPCs.

[Known Issues: Entering other rooms can be a little buggy.]
